00088 class EGS_BOX_EXPORT EGS_Box : public EGS_BaseGeometry {
00089 
00090     EGS_Float           ax, ay, az;
00091     EGS_AffineTransform *T;
00092     static string       type;
00093 
00094 public:
00095 
00096     EGS_Box(EGS_Float a, const EGS_AffineTransform *t = 0,
00097             const string &Name = "") : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name),
00098             ax(a), ay(a), az(a), T(0)  {
00099         if( t ) T = new EGS_AffineTransform(*t);
00100         nreg = 1;
00101     };
00102 
00103     EGS_Box(EGS_Float Ax, EGS_Float Ay, EGS_Float Az,
00104             const EGS_AffineTransform *t = 0,
00105             const string &Name = "") : EGS_BaseGeometry(Name),
00106             ax(Ax), ay(Ay), az(Az), T(0)  {
00107         if( t ) T = new EGS_AffineTransform(*t);
00108         nreg = 1;
00109     };
00110 
00111     ~EGS_Box() { if( T ) delete T; };
00112 
00113     bool isInside(const EGS_Vector &x) {
00114         EGS_Vector xp = T ? x*(*T) : x;
00115         if( 2*xp.x + ax < 0 || 2*xp.x - ax > 0 ) return false;
00116         if( 2*xp.y + ay < 0 || 2*xp.y - ay > 0 ) return false;
00117         if( 2*xp.z + az < 0 || 2*xp.z - az > 0 ) return false;
00118         return true;
00119     };
00120 
00121     int isWhere(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isInside(x) ? 0 : -1; };
00122 
00123     int inside(const EGS_Vector &x) { return isWhere(x); };
00124 
00125     EGS_Float howfarToOutside(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x,
00126                         const EGS_Vector &u) {
00127         EGS_Float t = 1e30;
00128         howfar(ireg,x,u,t); return t;
00129     };
00130 
00131     int howfar(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x, const EGS_Vector &u,
00132             EGS_Float &t, int *newmed=0, EGS_Vector *normal=0) {
00133         EGS_Vector xp(x), up(u);
00134         if( T ) { xp = x*(*T); up = u*T->getRotation(); }
00135         if( ireg == 0  ) {
00136             EGS_Float t1 = 1e30; int inew = 0; EGS_Vector n;
00137             if( up.x > 0 ) { t1 = (ax - 2*xp.x)/(2*up.x); n.x = -1; }
00138             else if( up.x < 0 ) { t1 = -(ax + 2*xp.x)/(2*up.x); n.x = 1; }
00139             if( t1 < t ) { t = t1; inew = -1; }
00140             t1 = 1e30;
00141             if( up.y > 0 ) t1 = (ay - 2*xp.y)/(2*up.y);
00142             else if( up.y < 0 ) t1 = -(ay + 2*xp.y)/(2*up.y);
00143             if( t1 < t ) {
00144                 n.x = 0; n.y = up.y > 0 ? -1 : 1;
00145                 t = t1; inew = -1;
00146             }
00147             t1 = 1e30;
00148             if( up.z > 0 ) t1 = (az - 2*xp.z)/(2*up.z);
00149             else if( up.z < 0 ) t1 = -(az + 2*xp.z)/(2*up.z);
00150             if( t1 < t ) {
00151                 t = t1; inew = -1;
00152                 n.x = n.y = 0; n.z = up.z > 0 ? -1 : 1;
00153             }
00154             if( inew < 0 ) {
00155                 if( newmed ) *newmed = -1;
00156                 if( normal ) {
00157                     if( T ) *normal = T->getRotation()*n;
00158                     else *normal = n;
00159                 }
00160             }
00161             return inew;
00162         }
00163         EGS_Float t1 = 1e30;
00164         if( 2*xp.x + ax < 0 && up.x > 0 ) t1 = -(2*xp.x + ax)/(2*up.x);
00165         else if( 2*xp.x - ax > 0 && up.x < 0 ) t1 = -(2*xp.x - ax)/(2*up.x);
00166         if( t1 < t ) {
00167             EGS_Float y1 = xp.y + up.y*t1, z1 = xp.z + up.z*t1;
00168             if( 2*y1 + ay >= 0 && 2*y1 - ay <= 0 &&
00169                 2*z1 + az >= 0 && 2*z1 - az <= 0 ) {
00170                 t = t1;
00171                 if( newmed ) *newmed = med;
00172                 if( normal ) {
00173                     if( T ) {
00174                         const EGS_RotationMatrix &R = T->getRotation();
00175                         if( up.x > 0 ) *normal = R*EGS_Vector(-1,0,0);
00176                         else *normal = R*EGS_Vector(1,0,0);
00177                     }
00178                     else {
00179                         if( up.x > 0 ) *normal = EGS_Vector(-1,0,0);
00180                         else *normal = EGS_Vector(1,0,0);
00181                     }
00182                 }
00183                 return 0;
00184             }
00185         }
00186         t1 = 1e30;
00187         if( 2*xp.y + ay < 0 && up.y > 0 ) t1 = -(2*xp.y + ay)/(2*up.y);
00188         else if( 2*xp.y - ay > 0 && up.y < 0 ) t1 = -(2*xp.y - ay)/(2*up.y);
00189         if( t1 < t ) {
00190             EGS_Float x1 = xp.x + up.x*t1, z1 = xp.z + up.z*t1;
00191             if( 2*x1 + ax >= 0 && 2*x1 - ax <= 0 &&
00192                 2*z1 + az >= 0 && 2*z1 - az <= 0 ) {
00193                 t = t1;
00194                 if( newmed ) *newmed = med;
00195                 if( normal ) {
00196                     if( T ) {
00197                         const EGS_RotationMatrix &R = T->getRotation();
00198                         if( up.y > 0 ) *normal = R*EGS_Vector(0,-1,0);
00199                         else *normal = R*EGS_Vector(0,1,0);
00200                     }
00201                     else {
00202                         if( up.y > 0 ) *normal = EGS_Vector(0,-1,0);
00203                         else *normal = EGS_Vector(0,1,0);
00204                     }
00205                 }
00206                 return 0;
00207             }
00208         }
00209         t1 = 1e30;
00210         if( 2*xp.z + az < 0 && up.z > 0 ) t1 = -(2*xp.z + az)/(2*up.z);
00211         else if( 2*xp.z - az > 0 && up.z < 0 ) t1 = -(2*xp.z - az)/(2*up.z);
00212         if( t1 < t ) {
00213             EGS_Float x1 = xp.x + up.x*t1, y1 = xp.y + up.y*t1;
00214             if( 2*x1 + ax >= 0 && 2*x1 - ax <= 0 &&
00215                 2*y1 + ay >= 0 && 2*y1 - ay <= 0 ) {
00216                 t = t1;
00217                 if( newmed ) *newmed = med;
00218                 if( normal ) {
00219                     if( T ) {
00220                         const EGS_RotationMatrix &R = T->getRotation();
00221                         if( up.z > 0 ) *normal = R*EGS_Vector(0,0,-1);
00222                         else *normal = R*EGS_Vector(0,0,1);
00223                     }
00224                     else {
00225                         if( up.z > 0 ) *normal = EGS_Vector(0,0,-1);
00226                         else *normal = EGS_Vector(0,0,1);
00227                     }
00228                 }
00229                 return 0;
00230             }
00231         }
00232         return -1;
00233     };
00234 
00235     EGS_Float hownear(int ireg, const EGS_Vector &x) {
00236         EGS_Vector xp = T ? x*(*T) : x;
00237         if( ireg >= 0 ) {
00238             EGS_Float tmin;
00239             EGS_Float t1 = xp.x + 0.5*ax, t2 = 0.5*ax - xp.x;
00240             if( t1 < t2 ) tmin = t1; else tmin = t2;
00241             t1 = xp.y + 0.5*ay; if( t1 < tmin ) tmin = t1;
00242             t1 = 0.5*ay - xp.y; if( t1 < tmin ) tmin = t1;
00243             t1 = xp.z + 0.5*az; if( t1 < tmin ) tmin = t1;
00244             t1 = 0.5*az - xp.z; if( t1 < tmin ) tmin = t1;
00245             return tmin;
00246         }
00247         EGS_Float s1=0, s2=0; int nout = 0;
00248         if( 2*xp.x + ax < 0 ) {
00249             EGS_Float t = -0.5*ax - xp.x; s1 += t; s2 += t*t; nout++;
00250         }
00251         else if(2*xp.x - ax > 0) {
00252            EGS_Float t = xp.x - 0.5*ax; s1 += t; s2 += t*t;  nout++;
00253         }
00254         if( 2*xp.y + ay < 0 ) {
00255             EGS_Float t = -0.5*ay - xp.y; s1 += t; s2 += t*t; nout++;
00256         }
00257         else if(2*xp.y - ay > 0) {
00258            EGS_Float t = xp.y - 0.5*ay; s1 += t; s2 += t*t;  nout++;
00259         }
00260         if( 2*xp.z + az < 0 ) {
00261             EGS_Float t = -0.5*az - xp.z; s1 += t; s2 += t*t; nout++;
00262         }
00263         else if(2*xp.z - az > 0) {
00264            EGS_Float t = xp.z - 0.5*az; s1 += t; s2 += t*t;  nout++;
00265         }
00266         if( nout < 2 ) return s1;
00267         return sqrt(s2);
00268     };
00269 
00270     const string &getType() const { return type; };
00271 
00272     void printInfo() const;
00273 
00274 };
00275 
00276 #endif
